member.name: IDCompositionGaussianBlurEffect.SetBorderMode
member.summary: Sets the mode used to calculate the border of the image.
member.param: The mode used to calculate the border of the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionGaussianBlurEffect.SetStandardDeviation
member.summary: Sets the amount of blur to be applied to the image.
member.param: The amount of blur to be applied to the image. You can compute the blur radius of the kernel by multiplying the standard deviation by 3. The units of both the standard deviation and blur radius are DIPs. A value of zero DIPs disables this effect entirely.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionGaussianBlurEffect.SetStandardDeviation
member.summary: Sets the amount of blur to be applied to the image.
member.param: An animation that represents how the amount of blur changes over time. You can compute the blur radius of the kernel by multiplying the standard deviation by 3. The units of both the standard deviation and blur radius are DIPs. A value of zero DIPs disables this effect entirely. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionGaussianBlurEffect
member.summary: The Gaussian blur effect is used to blur an image by a Gaussian function, typically to reduce image noise and reduce detail.
